NC.Q: Between 2003 and 2013, did the total Alumni Giving Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2004 and 2006?
NC.A: The change in total alumni giving rate between 2003 and 2013 was {larger} than between 2004 and 2006.

NC.A: The average total alumni giving rate between 2005 and 2010 was {lower} than between 2005 and 2019.

MSR.A: {Arcane University Alumni Association} has the largest cumulative area.
